channel.title: High Scores on website problem
channel.description:
I have 100% high scores on my website right,
Well, I don't want to host the high scores off my PC because that would lag the hell out of my internet with the members I have.
I tried hosting it off of my VPS, but you can't because Xampp uses port 80, and so does the VPS's system.
Any one know how I could host my high scores with a free host or something?
DO NOT recommend http://www.byethost.com/
Gayest host there is.

item.title: High Scores on website problem
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
